Abstract. By applying the derivative operator to the corresponding hypergeometric
form of a q-series transformation due to Andrews [1, Theorem 4], we establish a
general harmonic number identity. As the special cases of it, several interesting
Chu-Donno type identities and Paule-Schneider type identities are displayed.
